mapper.sql: id, price_name, price_url, price_type, probability, created_time, amount
mapper.insert: insert into lucky_turntable (id, price_name, price_url, price_type, probability, created_time, amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

id,

probability,

amount,

mapper.update:
update lucky_turntable
price_name = #{priceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_url = #{priceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
probability = #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lucky_turntable set price_name = #{priceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_url = #{priceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, probability = #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sum(probability) from lucky_turntable and id != #{exceptId};
